name: KoderLabs LLC
description:
We’re an agile workshop, where ideas and execution meet. 
It’s hard to find a problem our engineers can’t solve - but it’s a lot trickier if you start by trying to push a square peg through a round hole. We speak many languages including: Java, Objective C, Swift, PHP, Python, Ruby, Javascript, Scala, Node JS, Angular JS and C# to name just a few.
